channel.title: Vote Yes for a new Mopar Theme!
channel.description:
This is the theme in question.
http://www.dzinerstudio.com/index.php?action=downloads;sa=view;down=105
[img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/9414/dibujogmf.png[/img]
Vote yes and give Mopar site members the option to choose a fresh new look for the site. Of course, the theme will be optional and you can still use this one if you so desire :P

item.title: Vote Yes for a new Mopar Theme!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:85, topic:392768”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=489938.msg3584496#msg3584496 date=1304048076]

Nah, too green.

nou /cool

Dunno, wait do we have to use that theme, or is it something optional we can change too?
[/quote]
It would be optional.[/quote]
Then it that case, i vote yes

Read full topic
item.source: Vote Yes for a new Mopar Theme!

item.source: Vote Yes for a new Mopar Theme!

item.title: Vote Yes for a new Mopar Theme!
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:78, topic:392768”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=489938.msg3583370#msg3583370 date=1303959546]
You should realize that this poll is for adding a theme as an option for people who want it. Everyone is voting no because they think it’s going to replace the old theme.
[/quote]

The poll is supposed to ask who would use it. Options are good, but it’s a lot of work to add a new theme, and I don’t want to do it if 10 people are going to use it.[/quote]
Is that due to database problems? Again? Or do you manually add the theme’s and configure the three forums to be able to view the one theme on the same database.

Read full topic
item.source: Vote Yes for a new Mopar Theme!

item.title: Vote Yes for a new Mopar Theme!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

LilXCj:

You should realize that this poll is for adding a theme as an option for people who want it. Everyone is voting no because they think it’s going to replace the old theme.

The poll is supposed to ask who would use it. Options are good, but it’s a lot of work to add a new theme, and I don’t want to do it if 10 people are going to use it.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Frell, post:71, topic:392768”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=489938.msg3582881#msg3582881 date=1303936231]
I voted yes, but I wouldn’t use that sort of theme at least, if Moparisthebest added a sort of theme that was brand new and not been used that much, I might turn to that one. Someone should create a custom theme for the forums as a suggestion for the side.
[/quote]
I plan on making a preview page with a theme (for mopcrft) and then if mitb likes it he can pay me to do the whole site because thats a fuckload of images

im only talkin enough for a minecraft copy :)[/quote]

lol mopar trick him into thinking mc is $0

item.source: Vote Yes for a new Mopar Theme!

item.title: Vote Yes for a new Mopar Theme!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I voted yes, but I wouldn’t use that sort of theme at least, if Moparisthebest added a sort of theme that was brand new and not been used that much, I might turn to that one. Someone should create a custom theme for the forums as a suggestion for the side.

Otherwise, I can care less whether we have a new theme or not, I would use the default theme as I have been.

Read full topic
